application

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Date: 12/10/17
    Author:
    C. Warren Hammock An array management class for the simulation. MainFXMLController takes the masterList and populates PermeableList, SaturatedList, and ImperviousList with the applicable surface types. This class takes those lists and generates values for final output.

      Instantiates the class and creates arraylists

      • RainLostToEvaporation

        public double RainLostToEvaporation(java.util.ArrayList<Surface> masterList)
        adds each evaluation of evaporation for each surface on the masterList. Each is added together to create and return a total.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a double
